title: "Just Put A Pink Ward Down" - Rengar mains

replies.body: That rengo aint even good. He didn't even hit you with bola or W for additional burst. Also he is full build...im not sure what you expect when you are a level 16 yi with 1 defensive item. Im guessing that rengar was miles ahead.

> [{quoted}](name=360D3GR3SS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IR9uB83o,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-29T15:54:24.201+0000)
>
> That rengo aint even good. He didn't even hit you with bola or W for additional burst. Also he is full build...im not sure what you expect when you are a level 16 yi with 1 defensive item. Im guessing that rengar was miles ahead.

don't forget rengar built full damage. that kitty has claws.
He used his e and w on velkoz, he got me while walking away.
you're an assassin, and you got hit by an assassin....not much else to say...
To be fair, he was a full item up on you and a fed late game Rengar built full damage *should* be terrifying to any non tank without CC.

letting us see level difference, or how ahead he was in gold, or lack of peel, would be nice

EDIT: lel can see build, no wonder
EDIT: rengar is my 3rd fave champ (gp and teemo beat him) but i dont play him that often because he requires to much constant practice to do jack shit with, i really doubt he needs nerfs

It's mostly because you don't really have any tankiness, and also Rengar late game with a full damage build hurts no matter what.

I still don't like Rengar however, if he gets fed then he simply deletes everybody on the enemy team without enough armor and health with 0 counterplay. If he gets behind he's still pretty annoying due to his slows/snares and still can instantly kill most ADCs without a defensive item, which typically is also the ADC's 5th or 6th item. He's a feast or famine champion that never really famines.
If you didn't wanna get nuked, you shouldn't have fed the entire game prior to this encounter.

http://i.imgur.com/y0F7AKW.png

The Rengar ended 27/1/3 with 345 CS at 40 minutes. Any carry that fed is going to be able to do obscene amounts of damage.
Rengar top is super strong. I honestly don't know why people don't pick him top lane more often...

Well, to be fair, you don't really have that good a peel on that team.

Janna would have been a nice pick, instead of Velk' Koz. (I assume Vel'Koz support and not Ahri.) 

But yeah, Rengar's a pain in the ass at times.
